original_text: Nobody will escape! It will be like a man who runs away from a lion, but then he meets a bear! When he goes into his house to be safe, he puts his hand on a wall and a snake bites him! Nobody will escape! It will be like a man who runs away from a lion, but then he meets a bear! When he goes into his house to be safe, he puts his hand on a wall and a snake bites him! Nobody will escape! It will be like a man who runs away from a lion, but then he meets a bear! When he goes into his house to be safe, he puts his hand on a wall and a snake bites him!
korean_text: 마치 사람이 사자를 피하다가 곰을 만나거나 혹은 집에 들어가서 손을 벽에 대었다가 뱀에게 물림 같도다

sentences.original_text: It will be like a man who runs away from a lion,
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 사자에게서 도망치는 사람과 같을 것이다.

sentences.original_text: but then he meets a bear!
When he goes into his house to be safe,
sentences.korean_translation: 안전하기 위해 그의 집으로 들어갈 때,

sentences.original_text: he puts his hand on a wall
